name: contact-list
description: Manage a list of your personal contacts.

scripts.develop: nodemon --ext 'js,json,html,css' --watch src --exec 'npm run lint && npm test && PORT=8080 npm start'
scripts.build: webpack --mode production --output dist/index.js src/index.js && cp -R src/index.html src/index.css src/jsondiffpatch.css src/schemas dist
